briefTitle: Sentinel Lymph Node Mapping With Near Infrared Fluorescent Markers
officialTitle: Sentinel Lymph Node Mapping With Near Infrared Fluorescent Markers
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Fluorescence imaging of sentinel lymph nodes with indocyanine green and methylene blue.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* early or progressive stage of breast cancer
* able to understand and willing to sign a written informed consent document

Exclusion Criteria:

* inflammatory cancerous tissue
* pregnant women
* history of allergic reactions to iodide or seafood allergy
* sentinel lymph nodes were not detected with radiocolloid and static gamma camera
* patients have previous breast surgery
* patients who were unwilling to enter the study
